Summary Note:
The RM first met Andrea Ibáñez at a wine tasting event in Madrid. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Having worked for over 18 years, Andrea Ibáñez brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Andrea Ibáñez is married to Herrera. Together they have 3 kids called Navarro, Cristina and Gómez.
Education Background:
In 2002, Andrea finished her secondary school education at IES Miguel Hernández Alicante.
Andrea completed her university studies at University of Valencia in 2006.
Occupation History:
Andrea Ibáñez is a 42 year old General Manager from Spain. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Andrea Ibáñez began her professional journey as a Hotel Manager at Meliá Hotels International S.A. in 2007, laying the foundation for future success.
At Barceló Hotels & Resorts S.A., she held the position of General Manager from 2011 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 150000 EUR.
She has house located in Salamanca, worth 1410000 EUR.

In 2008, she received an inheritance of 1120000 EUR from her late mother, who was a prominent Hedge Fund Manager, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In summary, Andrea has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
